message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a method for optimal control in continuous state systems using probabilistic graphical models. This involves the use of hidden Markov models and factorial HMMs, which are commonly used in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also applies the method to robot motor control tasks (cs.RO) and discusses the scalability of the approach (cs.SY). Additionally, the use of graphical models suggests a potential application in computer vision (cs.CV).
